attributes.action: Delay the imminent deportatation of the Mansour family and to allow their case for asylum to be heard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Mansour family have been forcably removed from their Manchester home in the early hours of Tuesday morning. They face iminent deportation back to Egypt tomorrow 4/06/09. The family fled Egypt because of religious persecution which threatened their lives. The injustice is that they have not received proper legal representation and the opportunity to put forward their case in a fair hearing.
We believe there are strong grounds for them to stay. They desperately need your support. Please sign this petition.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
